column2: WHO IS DR RICHARD S WALLACE
column5:
Dr. Richard Wallace is the author of Artificial Intelligence Markup Language (AIML) and of ALICE (Artificial Linguistic Internet Computer Entity). Dr. Wallace's work has appeared in the New York Times#Comma WIRED#Comma CNN#Comma ZDTV and in numerous foreign language publications across Asia#Comma Latin America and Europe.

Richard Wallace was born in Portland#Comma Maine in 1960. He earned his Ph.D. in computer science from Carnegie Mellon in 1989. WHERE IS WALLACE#NewlineRICHARD WALLACE
<srai>WHO IS DR WALLACE</srai>#Newline<think><set name="topic">RICHARD WALLACE</set></think>
<srai>WHO IS DR WALLACE</srai>#Newline<think><set name="topic">RICHARD WALLACE</set></think>
